title: Diploma in HTML5 Game Development
headline: Learn how to develop professional games using HTML5, JavaScript, and the Apache Cordova platform with this free course.
description: This free course in online HTML5 game development will teach you the do's and don'ts of computer game development. By the end of this course, you will know how to create video games for mobile platforms and web browsers, how to create a map and player characters for your games, how to add interactions and a battle system to your games, and how to conduct proper planning and documentation practices for games development.
courseDescription:
The course starts by introducing you to the Apache Cordova platform for mobile application development. You will learn to create background maps, characters with controls, and an inventory system for the player character. The course will then teach you to create a non-player character. You will also learn to create a shop menu for the player character to buy items. The course will then show you how to use the Enchants screen stack to create battle systems for your character to fight enemy NPCs.

The course will then discuss proper planning for game development. You will look into the important issues to be addressed during planning as well as the main documentation that game developers use during their projects. The course will also teach you how to add magic to your game's battle system, set up a menu system, end game screen, and add sound effects. You will then learn how to build an Azure website, create a server to host a multiplayer feature for your game, and connect the player to the server.

The modern games industry is full of overly complex or simple games that don't function well or lack an engaging storyline. The reason for this is simple: games developers that lack proper training. This course is designed to make sure the game that you produce is high quality and effective. This will give you a real edge over your competition. So why wait? Check out the course today, and gain some really useful and exciting skills in just a few hours.
